//===== Hercules Script ======================================
//= MVP Arena
//===== By: ==================================================
//= Darkchild
//===== Current Version: =====================================
//= 1.4
//===== Description: =========================================
//= Rooms containing 16 different MVPs
//===== Additional Comments: =================================
//= 1.0 - First version of script
//= 1.1 - Optimised The MVP arena [massdriller]
//= 1.2 - NPC in prontera [Silent]
//= 1.3 - Removed Duplicates
//= 1.4 - Optimized, text edited [Euphy]
//============================================================

// Entrance
invek,136,157,5	script	Mercado Negro	4_M_EIN_SOLDIER,{
	mes "[ ^0065DFMercado Negro^000000 ]";
	mes "Bem-Vindo ao Mercado Negro eu sou porteiro da entrada do Mercado Negro voce gostaria de entra";
	mes "Va para Mercado Negro";
	if (select("Certo!","Não Obrigado.") == 2) close;
	warp "sec_in01.gat",85,60;
	close;
}

sec_in01,87,58,5	script	Saida	4_M_EIN_SOLDIER,{
	mes "[ ^0065DFSaida^000000 ]";
	mes "Voce gostaria de volta para prontera";
	mes "Va para Prontera";
	if (select("Certo!","Não Obrigado.") == 2) close;
	warp "prontera",162,167;
	close;
}

sec_in01.gat,88,61,4	shop	Vendedor de Utilidades	4_F_02,501:-1,502:-1,503:-1,504:-1,506:-1,645:-1,656:-1,601:-1,602:-1,1065:-1,611:-1,678:50000,607:70000
